channel.title: Blog on A software engineering blog and portofolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on A software engineering blog and portofolio

item.title: How to use Testcontainers for DAO Unit Tests (JdbcTemplate)
item.description: This article will show how to test a Data Access Object (DAO) in Spring Boot using Testcontainers. Testcontainers is used in tests to create a temporary docker container that contains a real, temporary database instead of mocking it.

item.title: How do you even handle errors in Go?
item.description: Error handling is one of the things I’ve struggled with the most while learning Go. The issue lies in where and how to handle these errors.
